name: KATastrophe (ProfessorDaytime)
description:
The government controls citizens' water supply to once a day.  When people die or are out of town, you must collect their water before it is shut off.  

I was going to add a full menu system at the restaurant, but ran out of time.  Now I'd rather not finish that one part.  maybe some day...

Music: Professor Daytime - noone
